summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SESI public pages and APIs. 17/18 backend API tests passed. All public pages (Home, Executive Committee, Member Profiles, News, Events, Programs) load correctly with orange/red theme. Navigation dropdowns work properly. One backend bug found: /api/public/members returns 500 due to response model mismatch.

critical.issue: Returns 500 error - ResponseValidationError: Member model requires email, mobile, membership_type fields but endpoint returns limited fields (id, full_name, qualification, specialization, city, state, hospital)
critical.fix_suggestion: Either remove response_model=List[Member] from the endpoint or create a new PublicMemberView model with only the public fields

action_items: Fix /api/public/members endpoint - create PublicMemberView Pydantic model with limited fields (id, full_name, qualification, specialization, city, state, hospital) and use it as response_model
critical_code_review_comments: Backend: /api/public/members endpoint has response model mismatch - returns limited fields but uses full Member model
All other public APIs working correctly with proper data validation

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all public pages load and function correctly)

seed_data_creation: Using existing seeded data: 16 committee members, 4 news articles, 3 events
context_for_next_testing_agent: Public pages fully tested. One backend bug in /api/public/members needs fix. All navigation dropdowns (Programs, Education, Publications, Resources) working. News category filters and Events status filters working correctly. Orange/red theme applied consistently across all pages.

features_tested.public_api_committee: PASS - GET /api/public/committee returns 16 members with proper structure
features_tested.public_api_news: PASS - GET /api/public/news returns 4 articles with category filter
features_tested.public_api_events: PASS - GET /api/public/events returns 3 events with status filter
features_tested.public_api_statistics: PASS - Returns member count, event count, etc.
features_tested.public_api_members: FAIL - 500 error due to response model mismatch
features_tested.public_api_gallery: PASS - Returns empty list (no gallery images seeded)
features_tested.public_api_publications: PASS - Returns empty list (no publications seeded)
features_tested.frontend_home: PASS - Hero, stats, committee preview, news, events sections all visible
features_tested.frontend_executive_committee: PASS - Office bearers and EC members displayed with year filter
features_tested.frontend_member_profile: PASS - Individual profile pages with slug-based URLs working
features_tested.frontend_news: PASS - News grid with category filters working
features_tested.frontend_events: PASS - Events list with status filters working
features_tested.frontend_programs: PASS - Education Initiatives, Research Support, Community Outreach pages working
features_tested.frontend_navigation_dropdowns: PASS - All 4 dropdown menus (Programs, Education, Publications, Resources) working
features_tested.frontend_theme: PASS - Orange/red gradient theme applied consistently

mocked_apis.email_notifications: Email sending is MOCKED (printed to console)
